doc.field: Transportation Analysis Zones for External Counties
Transportation Analysis Zones for External Counties
U.S. Census Bureau and Metropolitan Council
U.S. Census Bureau and Metropolitan Council

Transportation analysis zones are subdivisions of geographical areas that are delineated for land use and travel analysis purposes. This dataset covers 13 counties outside of the seven Twin Cities metro counties. They are the Minnesota counties of Chisago, Goodhue, Isanti, Le Sueur, Mc Leod, Mille Lacs, Rice, Sherburne, Sibley and Wright; and the Wisconsin counties of Pierce, Polk and St. Croix.

Metropolitan Council projected to UTM, NAD83 Meters and combined counties. Then TAZ IDs were added by Metropolitan Council staff.
In December 2003, attributes for population and households were added. This attribute data was from the US Census Transportation Planning Package (CTPP) part 1.</procdesc> </procstep> </lineage> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <indspref>TAZ identifier</indspref> <direct>Vector</direct> <mgmg3obj>Polygon</mgmg3obj> <mgmg3til>One layer for entire area</mgmg3til> </spdoinfo> <spref> <horizsys> <geograph> <latres /> <longres /> <geogunit /></geograph> <planar> <mapproj> <mapprojn /> <mgmg4par /> <otherprj /> </mapproj> <gridsys> <gridsysn>UTM</gridsysn> <utm> <utmzone>15</utmzone> </utm> <spcs> <spcszone /> </spcs> <mgmg4coz /> <mgmg4adj /> </gridsys> <planci> <coordrep> <absres /> <ordres /> </coordrep> <distbrep> <distres /> </distbrep> <plandu>Meters</plandu> </planci> </planar> <geodetic> <horizdn>NAD83</horizdn> <ellips>GRS80</ellips> </geodetic> </horizsys> <vertdef> <altsys> <altdatum /> <altunits /> </altsys> <depthsys> <depthdn /> <depthdu /> </depthsys> </vertdef> </spref> <eainfo> <overview> <eaover>POLYGON ATTRIBUTES:
COUNTY: The two digit FIPS state code appended to the three digit FIPS county code. This provides a unique county code across state boundaries.
TAZ_2000: The unique identifier for each zone.
POP_2000: Population for the TAZ from the 2000 US Census Transportation Planning Package (CTPP).
HH_2000: Households for the TAZ from the 2000 CTPP.</eaover> <eadetcit>None</eadetcit> </overview> </eainfo> <distinfo> <distrib> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Mark Kotz</cntper> <cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>GIS Database Administrator</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype> mailing and physical address </addrtype> <address>390 Robert Street North</address> <city>St. Paul</city> <state>Minnesota</state> <postal>55101-1805</postal> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>651-602-1644</cntvoice> <cntfax>651-602-1674</cntfax> <cntemail>mark.kotz@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail> </cntinfo> </distrib> <resdesc>TAZExternalCounties</resdesc> <distliab>NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13).
